resources.string: Welcome to &appname;, the app where your real-life activity will determine your on-field performances. \nMy name\'s James, and I\'ll be your agent. I\'m here to guide you through the app, and your football career.

Before you get on the pitch, we need to do a medical. I\'m gonna need to get in touch with your fitness app and get some details. Don\'t worry though, this info is only used to decide your match performance!"
Business man in a white shirt
